meanings: It is something even a dog would laugh at
실용회화-기쁨 This is not an occasion for laughing.

vlive.korean: [우... 웃을 일이야??] [...Is that something to laugh about?] View video IU : [IU TV] 아이유 분노의 시승식!
[다시 하면 안 웃을 수 있어요?] [Can you not laugh if you do it again?] View video ASTRO : [ASTRO PLAY] MV 촬영장.knock
vlive.english: [Can you not laugh if you do it again?]

vlive.korean: 형은 웃을 때가 제일 무서워 - 그래? Hyung, you are scariest when you laugh. - Really? 듣기 View video SF9 : 나생일🎂
vlive.english: Hyung, you are scariest when you laugh. - Really?

vlive.korean: 다음 효정 언니는 난 언니 웃을 때가 너무 예쁘잖아 - 한 명씩이야? I think HYOJUNG looks so pretty when she smiles. - Are we taking turns? 듣기 View video OSEN : OH MY GIRL 오마이걸, 멤버들과 가장 하고 싶은 일은? #스타로드 10
vlive.english: I think HYOJUNG looks so pretty when she smiles. - Are we taking turns?

vlive.korean: 은우는 웃을 것이냐..! Will Eunwoo smile?! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [ASTRO] 🦊:들리니??! 🐂:들리겠어요? (ASTRO visiting their concept zone)

examples.korean: I had to smile at his optimism. 발음듣기 나는 그의 낙천주의에 웃을 수밖에 없었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I had to smile at his optimism. 발음

examples.korean: It was scarcely an occasion for laughter. 발음듣기 그것은 결코 웃을 일이 아니었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It was scarcely an occasion for laughter. 발음

examples.korean: If we win the next game we’ll be laughing. 발음듣기 다음 경기에서 이기면 우린 웃을 수 있을 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: If we win the next game we’ll be laughing. 발음

examples.korean: It’s not funny! Someone could have been hurt. 발음듣기 웃을 일이 아냐! 누군가가 다칠 수도 있었다구. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It’s not funny! Someone could have been hurt. 발음

examples.korean: I can’t wear that! I’d be a laughing stock. 발음듣기 난 그거 입을 수 없어! 웃음거리가 될 거야[사람들이 다 웃을 거야.] Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I can’t wear that! I’d be a laughing stock. 발음
